import classes from './Cart.module.css' import Modal from './Modal' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../storage/cartContext' function Cart(props){ const cartctx = useContext(CartContext) const totalamount = cartctx.totalamount.toFixed(2) const cartItems=(
) return( {cartItems}
{totalamount} 99
) } export default Cart
